website_summaries.verdict: A Bluetooth speaker that works well for business and entertainment.
pros: We love that it shuts off after 15 minutes of no activity, preserving battery
Used professionally by those who work from home and conduct frequent conference calls
High marks for clarity of sound and the built-in kickstand
cons: Works with only one speaker at a time

customer_reviews.title: If sound could be described as luxurious this will be it.
customer_reviews.text: Day 1. Just got it today. If sound could be described as luxurious this will be it. I have three Anker soundcore speakers of different varieties and they are great in the $20-30 range. The difference between this speaker and Anker is not dramatic, but it is there...this speaker is luxurious.The sound, the feel, the materials. I paid $65 for it and it is absolutely worth double the price of Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews critique the bass, but they're wrong. ...
customer_reviews.text: Other reviews critique the bass, but they're wrong. This wireless, ultra-portable device sounds way bigger than it is. It won a design award for a reason -- it is sleek and gorgeous. We bought it primarily as a wireless bluetooth speaker phone, and it it works superbly. Crystal clear sound, can be stood upright for one speaker, or lay flat as a true conference phone (four directional microphones). Callers tell us they hear us perfectly. It is professional, gorgeous, and small enough you could carry it anywhere. As others have noted, it doesn't come with a case, and that's unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: LMFla1

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function Done Right Equals Great Experience!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!! I am so ecstatic I bought this. The experience of listening to my tunes quadrupled when I turned this speaker on! I started using it for my conference calls as well and everyone said they hear me perfectly clear. I bought this on a whim and out of curiosity but now, I cannot imagine working without it. I also love the compact size and the gorgeous modern design!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Owen D

customer_reviews.title: The sound is fantastic, I have the mini and this one adds ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is fantastic, I have the mini and this one adds the extra kick in the lower end to give it a fuller rich sound in the bass department.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm blown away with the detail and quality of this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a great deal and took a risk due to great reviews and it has far exceeded my expectations. I'm not convinced the EQ is perfectly flat, it does seem to have some character of its own, but it has a subtlety where I am hearing new details in songs I have known for many years. I have no idea what technically makes it sound so good, but it really does. A really great speaker for the bedside, for listening to music while working or watching videos. Sounds great with everything from Steely Dan and other Jazz to Metal.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: So good that one is not enough
customer_reviews.text: Within ten minutes of opening the box I clicked on Amazon and was ordering another. I hope that they hold up as well as they sound. Clean sounding right out of the box. Not really for the Bass lover. I do wish it was available in the Blue or Red like the Mini version comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Willie

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like the unit. Purchased for providing a decent option for business skype calls with computer and conference call with cell phone. When used as speaker phone, it looks like only half of the speaker is working because of mono sound but still clear with plenty of volume. Bass is not as bad as I was reading in the reviews. You can feel it is still pushing a lot on low frequencies despite thickness. When compared to Bose Revolve+, it has obviously less bass but the stereo sound on the Esquire 2 plays in its favor. I purchased at 160$ but saw other deals later on at 129$ which definitely make it a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for calls (bad microphones)
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great for that range, but microphone pickup is mediocre and does not compare at all with the emeet or the Jabra Speak 710. If you want to use it only as a speaker then there are better sounding speakers for lower price, and if you want to use it for Skyping with family or calling then get one of the models I mentioned
customer_reviews.author: MUHAMMAD SAMIR

customer_reviews.title: Almost there...
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love it. I work from home and I am constantly listening to background music. I used it for about 3 weeks. When I play anything with a small amount of base, the music sounds terrible. The mic for conference calls is also below average. For classical music, it is great, but I want to listen all types of music, not just classical. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: It is very sleek and stylish and could fill a backyard with some tunes easily. Would I pay the normal price tag on ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this speaker on a special deal and boy did it impress me more than I thought it would. It is very sleek and stylish and could fill a backyard with some tunes easily. Would I pay the normal price tag on this? NO. But if you can catch it on a deal then it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Speaker clarity is great, it could be louder for the price
customer_reviews.text: We have had this speaker for a month. The sound aspect is really decent for the size of the speaker although the price is too high for what it has to offer. Speaker clarity is great, it could be louder for the price. The reason for one star is the battery life is bad. A fully charged speaker lasts upto one hour max and shuts off. Unfortunately we are outside of the return window or else this speaker is definitely not worth the price. There are many better options in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great conference room speaker!
customer_reviews.text: We use this to connect to cell phones for multiple people using a single conference room. It's a fantastic speaker and the mics really pick up our voices pretty well. We do have to speak up if we're more than about 3-4 feet from the speaker. We've had up to 4-5 people in the conference room talking to 2-3 people on multiple phone lines and it's been perfect. I'd highly recommend this for a small business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but really good
customer_reviews.text: Quite a price to pay but really a high quality product as a speaker as well as a conference phone. The quad microphones deliver superb quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bluelighthouse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: Was happy at first. Not sure really when I began having issues but stops playing after about an hour, actually either a battery issue or Bluetooth because I can connect again but annoying. Called customer service, not very helpful expected better from Harmon/kardon. Lot of speakers less expensive
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my co-worker had the original ESQUIRE and the sound is excellent. This one is good but the sound on the original is better. The sound us good clear and precise but the original seems to be "louder". But i am satisfied with it .
customer_reviews.author: PkwyDoe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Work or music
customer_reviews.text: I use this at work for a conf speaker. Works great. Also use for work when traveling. Very nice and sound quality is really good for my usage. My son sometimes takes if for a speaker for music in backyard.
customer_reviews.author: M Rams

customer_reviews.title: Honest review from a tough critic.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not 100% sold that it was brand new product when I received it. That being said, it’s a beautiful piece of equipment. The sound quality is superb, even at higher volumes. Connects to Bluetooth with ease. The four-mic conference call feature works well for those who are experiencing it on the other end. It has an excellent, clean, crisp sound with no lag and a perfect amount of bass output. This sleek, classy speaker packs a pleasant auditory punch while being visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, long battery life, attractive, well built, and great for conference calling with your cell phone
customer_reviews.text: This little Harmon Kardon speaker is well made. It sounds good for it's size, and it works very well as a speaker phone. I linked it to my Amazon Dot and use it as the speaker for the Dot. I also use it for conference calls at condo board meetings so that all parties can hear and be heard.
customer_reviews.author: Techie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't worth this price
customer_reviews.text: The design is magnificence and the name is beautiful but Sound is normal with poor bass so I really didn't like it
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Very good speakerphone, bass no so good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great as speakerphone. Bass makes the speaker vibrate, but it looks like it lacks weight to make the bass really sound. Further sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: Willem

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not earth shattering but Very Good sound. Solid bass for the size especially under 50% volume. would recommend. I also do think the charging port is a nice extra feature.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Great for music and phone in an older car without bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Great sound both for phone calls and music. I use it in my car, which doesn't have bluetooth. I do have a few critiques: it's a tad bulkier than I thought but still quite portable. The phone button inexplicably does not activate voice dialing, it just pauses if you are playing media and if you aren't, it starts playing whatever the last media was you were playing. The buttons aren't that easy to see and press in the car. But having said that, I can voice dial by pressing the pause (phone) button and saying "OK Google". Because this has multiple microphones google can hear me and obey. Callers can hear me and I can hear them.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, one of the best out there for its size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, one of the best out there for its size.
customer_reviews.author: Kocho

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, horrible battery
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a little over a year at my office, used as a speakerphone mainly. For the last 6 months or so, i've noticed that it doesn't hold a charge if I unplug it, maxing out at 3/5 dots on the battery meter. I can at best get about 3 songs out of it before it dies and I have to plug it in again. Not sure if I got a dud, but it is basically a plug in speaker now instead of a wireless speaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: imagine

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it works well most of the time ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works well most of the time it occasionally drops out during long conference calls even if charging. I have not been able to figure out the pattern of why it drops sometimes and works other times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality and a perfect size. I just wished it could mp3 files from a flash drive?
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and delicate design with perfect sound, i like very much this device. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: This HK Esquire 2 has The biggest sound for such a flat device. Music is a necessity while I am at work. My goal was so to slim down from my sony srs-x55. Extremely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the size and the sound is great. Easy to connect by wireless....great purchase
customer_reviews.author: CRJ

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome. The bass is off the chart
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. The bass is off the chart. Sound is great and looks so beautiful. Pretty long battery life haven't timed it for an exact time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: I really like this. it is easy to set up has ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. it is easy to set up has great sound, and the battery seems to last a long time . I haven't tried the phone calls on it but it wasn't the main reason for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Vito

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product. Great fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product. Great fit and finish. Sounds great. Volume is good, not great, but totally serviceable for a portable speaker. Great as a speakerphone.
customer_reviews.author: K. Trevor Chong

customer_reviews.title: The speaking is turning off every 2 min
customer_reviews.text: the speaker is shutting off every 2 min, I really hope that the warranty will work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool sounds, cool looking
customer_reviews.text: It is the best portable speaker I have. My girlfriend took it though.
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it as speaker for AppleTV so don’t need tv across room to be loud.
customer_reviews.author: RonBMT

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great portable speaker. Very sleek design! It's going to look great on my desk at work! The first speaker I received had a manufacturer problem but the seller was super helpful and had a new one shipped out to me ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for this speaker, and it didn't let me down. Because I travel frequently, I was looking for the best listening experience while on the road (hotel rooms/lower volume; indie rock, jazz, any "good" music). The sound is incredible. Highs are mid natural and well-balanced. Bass is not very clear - which isn't unexpected given the size - but it is solid and provides a good foundation for the music I've listed to so far. Before this, I tried a JBL Flip 3 and was very disappointed with the sound quality. Although this is more than twice the cost, for me, it was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really a conference call intercom works but not loud like a Bluetooth speaker, looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely great speakers, I was looking for the speakers and ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great speakers,I was looking for the speakers and i was considering Bose but wait! Look at this, great design amazing sound, various colors available It's worth
customer_reviews.author: rahul jerath

customer_reviews.title: feel the sound quality is very good. Before the introduction of a friend bought a
customer_reviews.text: Get the goods, listen to all of a sudden, feel the sound quality is very good. Before the introduction of a friend bought a, this time is to buy, feel something worth.
customer_reviews.author: airuyi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sound but very heavy for travel so not that convenient
customer_reviews.author: TripletMommy

customer_reviews.title: HELP!
customer_reviews.text: amazing sound, great look. love it for 6 months... till it started to turn itself OFF after 5 min. of listening!!!!!!!!!!! does anyone here expirienced same issue? help!
customer_reviews.author: yaara mizrahi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life very low have to plug in to charge too often
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best for conference
customer_reviews.text: exactly what i was looking for. The best for conference calls
customer_reviews.author: enrico

customer_reviews.title: best bluetooth speaker I've owned
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is excellent, holds charge all day, light enough to carry with you everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McCann

customer_reviews.title: What? I can hear you and you can hear me? Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an improvement over the speaker phone on my iPhone 6. It's small enough to bring with me to meetings and always works well. Client's are impressed with the quality. The bonus is the quite good speaker for listening to tunes. Yeah, a small case, even a simple fabric one, would be good, but it wasn't promised in the listing so there was no surprise there.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality speaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a speakerphone in my home office, works very well and has great quality sound. Good build quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last
customer_reviews.text: I bough this product a year ago now and the battery (when unplugged) does not last any more than a few minutes now... I need to keep it plugged in at all times.
customer_reviews.author: Ana G

customer_reviews.title: love, love
customer_reviews.text: This is my third speaker, love, love, love them all!!
customer_reviews.author: evansca

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound. Perfect for home office environments. Great for conference calls
customer_reviews.author: HEMC

customer_reviews.title: Conference Call Rescue and Awesome Music
customer_reviews.text: Awesome speaker. Use for Skype and cellphone driven conference calls and picks up speech of multiple people 3-5 feet away. Bought one for both work and home office and smaller version for travel. Awesome music speaker as well. Bluetooth makes for easy connection. Very long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good speaker, treble is awesome, dont expect that much base tho
customer_reviews.author: Isaac C.

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and classy
customer_reviews.text: Clean and classy looking, good size for packing, not too heavy. This has a small and sturdy stand that pops out the back - handy. Sound is surprisingly crisp and it's not overly distorted on the bass like Bose however dont take as meaning it's got not bass, it comes in spades. Bluetooth range is excellent. Would happily buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shabba

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is great. Very surprised for the cost and size
customer_reviews.author: WildChild

customer_reviews.title: Big and Bulky, Go With Esquire Mini
customer_reviews.text: The Esquire Mini is just as good at half the size, The sound is a little better than the mini but not enough to justify the size. I returned it and kept my mini which I use everyday all day
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Teleconferences and Music
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT speaker for use with phones for hands free use or as a teleconference speaker.Most people have no idea I am speaking through it or that they are on a speaker. Sounds great with music though a bit shy on deeper bass. The clarity of the sound more than makes up for this.
customer_reviews.author: John L

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! The sound is amazing! It's LOUD! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BelleDeJour

customer_reviews.title: useful for conference calls
customer_reviews.text: attractive. useful for conference calls. not practical for travel w/o case. A little fragile finish requires thorough protection and it is a little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: George Orwell

customer_reviews.title: Great accessory for an iPhone
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bluetooth speaker. I use it every day to listen to music or iHeart Radio on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Sound is outstanding for its size.
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at the quality of sound. I was skeptical because i had purchased other small BT speakers but this one blew me away. Now, I caveat that I only received this today and started playing with it but again I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: me32569

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this thing, small size big sound. and the design doesnt get better for what is out there
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Al Saeed

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Excelent Product , Nice Sound and Quality . Very Nice Model. Too Bad Didtn Have The Case
customer_reviews.author: Albertini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 21-year-old grandson. He absolutely loves it!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The front grill was bent and damaged and all the ...
customer_reviews.text: The front grill was bent and damaged and all the casing had deep scratches and scuffs. The sound is also distorted due to physical damage of the grill.cant return due to leaving country so have to keep for partial refund ( still not worth it )
customer_reviews.author: Ali Nouri Khorasani

customer_reviews.title: Decent, But Could Be Better
customer_reviews.text: Nice build quality, but the mfg skimps by not including a case. Come on - no case? This is a portable unit. How you gonna keep it in decent shape while carrying around in backpacks and bags without a case. The lack of a charger, I'm ok with that. I've got a million USB chargers. But the lack of even a simple case is not cool. Otherwise, audio performance seems ok. While I don't expect bass for something this size, the treble is rolled off a bit more than I think it should be. Pleasant, but non-remarkable sound.
customer_reviews.author: R. Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone else. He loves it. I've had a couple chances to listen to it and it has great sound quality. It's portable and phone calls are very clear (tested indoors). Quad-speakers are nice to have onboard. Can charge batteries to other devices connected through USB (ie, cell phone), but of course it drains the battery of the speaker, which lessens the play time. I think my friend says he got 6 hours out of it. (And he was probably playing loudly...) Great brand to own. Dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Antwon

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but ONLY for conference calls.
customer_reviews.text: These work pretty well for our purposes... basically a conference room with 20 or so people around a table and someone calling in. As long as you're actively using it in that way, it works very well, and sound quality is decent. Unfortunately, it does NOT work for just recording a meeting. I tried doing this a few times to record meetings for absent staff to listen to later, and the unit shuts itself off after a period of what it sees as "inactivity". I checked with support, and there is no way around this behavior. Unfortunate, because it would have made it a much more versatile tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality, dependability and servise
customer_reviews.text: Got this for sitting around the deck or down by the pool. It is an excellent quality speaker with great style and sound and portability for home or anywhere you might travel. Worked great on cruise. Excellent value. Buy again
customer_reviews.author: Richard E. Lane

customer_reviews.title: I did not get good conference results
customer_reviews.text: The thing is bigger than you think. I did not get good conference results, so I sent it back. Sounds good to me when playing music though.
customer_reviews.author: jhachtel

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers ever
customer_reviews.text: I love Harman Kardom. I have ordered 3 different models and love them all.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Mosquera

product_meta.title: Harman Kardon HKESQUIRE2GLD Esquire 2 Gold Esquire 2 Speaker
product_meta.description: The Harman Kardon Esquire 2 portable Bluetooth speaker is the centerpiece of master craftsmanship and performance, blending premium materials with the needs of on the go professionals. Esquire 2 delivers rich high end acoustics by incorporating advanced acoustic engineering into 4 professionally tuned sound drivers. Its rechargeable battery supports up to 8 hours of playtime and USB charge out to ensure that travelling professionals never run out of power. The Esquire 2 also features an unparalleled conferencing system; underneath the aluminum unibody design embedded with quad microphone Voice Logic noise and echo cancelling technology with 360 degree voice pick up for crystal clear conferencing experiences even in the noisiest places. Esquire 2’s slim form factor and lightweight design effortlessly slips into a suitcase or handbag, but also makes its presence known when placed center stage in a conference room.
feature_bullets: Advanced craftsmanship redefined elegance and performance in an all in one speaker
The ultra thin speaker to take your music anywhere
3200 mAH rechargeable battery and USB for charging external devices
